name: Space Planet Adventure
description:
Well it's the first game that I made without a tutorial. Pretty much just wanted to see what I am capable of It really isn't much.

There is no goal, just fly around, look at the 4 planets. So keep that in mind. Also probably not going to update it at all.

It was made using Game Maker, Paint.net, Mario Paint composer, and Audacity. Took about 18 hours of work to make. Though those were spread over the course of a year. About 6 of those hours were spent on the engine, the rest was arting.
